content: Connecting #implementers > Device bundles for Hospital to this stream. @Nilesh Pagare ... we did briefly discuss this topic during the weekly Wednesday Devices on FHIR (DoF) - which is under the HL7 Devices (DEV) work group. That discussion was part of working through the DEV agenda for the upcoming WGM, where we have a [joint session planned with OO Thursday Q1] (https://confluence.hl7.org/display/OO/OO+WGM+Agenda+-+202009) . Your topic could probably be included in that discussion, or I believe the OO device product group has meetings frequently that you might be able to join.
Thank you @Todd Cooper . I wasn't planning to attend WMG in Sept, but given a chance would love to present my case in that discussion.
you could present it here in Zulip to explain the scope first...
